data.actual_result: The link immediately opens the "Join Server" screen. (Got confirmation from a Developer it's a bug)
data.expected_result: The link should prompt you where it should be opened.
data.short_description: Invite links at the bottom of a message will not show a prompt.
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message and put an invite link as last sentence. - Send the message and click on the invite link. (Make sure you don't have a default browser set)
